name: Authentic Wonton Soup
author: BRUNOSBETH
summary: This wonton soup has been perfected through trial and error. Be sure to use fresh ingredients. Please follow all the steps and you will not be disappointed!
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) pork tenderloin, or to taste
1 (4 ounce) can small shrimp, drained and chopped
directions: Rub pork tenderloin with 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce
Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker
Cook on High until tender, 3 to 4 hours
Cool until easily handled, about 10 minutes
Mix remaining 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce, ground pork, shrimp, bread crumbs, rice vinegar, cilantro, ginger, and soy sauce together in a large bowl
Place a 3/4-inch round ball of ground pork filling in the center of each wonton wrapper
Brush edges with water; fold and seal
Bring chicken stock and beef stock to a low boil in a large pot
Add wontons; cook until ground pork filling is no longer pink in the center, about 7 minutes
Serve soup garnished with green onions
